attributes.action: police policy policies and policy - makers properly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What exactly is a "policy" ? Do they make a difference ? Does anyone actually think they work ? Who designs them ? Why ? I am mithered to death with middle managers telling me I have to do this and that because it is "policy". The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to design a policy on policies policy.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
